name: Mazaic
description:
Mazaic (may-ZAY-uhk) is a rogue-like puzzle platformer where you have to unscramble a mosaic dungeon.

Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space/Up Arrow
  • Interact (contextual): S or Down

Engine:  Unity

Sprite Editor:  Paint.net

SFX Maker:  bfxr.net

Music: "Peek-Door Quest" by Rolemusic
